name: Shootout (koizura)
description:
Shootout, a fast-paced online multiplayer top-down shooting game, developed by Koizura. Inspired by .io games.

Developed in p5.js, networking done with web sockets.

== INSTRUCTIONS ==
+ WASD keys to move
+ R to reload
+ SPACE or CLICK to shoot
+ hold ESCAPE to return to menu
+ ENTER to open chat
=================
